# Angular Portal Project

## Project Overview
This is an Angular portal application with routing, Server-Side Rendering (SSR), and modern standalone components built with Angular CLI.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Angular 21.1.3
- **Features**: Routing, Standalone Components, SSR/SSG
- **Package Manager**: npm
- **Styling**: CSS
- **Testing**: Vitest

## Development
- Run `npm start` to start the development server
- Run `npm run build` to build the project
- Run `npm test` to run tests

## Project Structure
- `src/app/` - Application components and routing
- `src/server.ts` - SSR server configuration
- `public/` - Static assets
- `.vscode/` - VS Code tasks and launch configurations
